H0.text: Originating in early central American culture, where on the body would a huarache be worn. Head

H1.text: Originating in early central American culture, where on the body would a huarache be worn. Wrist

H2.text: Originating in early central American culture, where on the body would a huarache be worn. Ankle

H3.text: Originating in early central American culture, where on the body would a huarache be worn. Foot

A4.text: Huaraches are a type of Mexican sandal
